name: change payload to the speed number
Inject to OPS as canned data
To pump in fake data, enable the repeater
About current random values:
info:
At the moment, the random # is -75 to +75
IF the system is configured to turn off the
camera when less than 25, then the camera would be off 1/3 of the time.  Not a bad test.

name: radar init: switch to JSON, RadarObject, no fractions, UNITS
option: enable node to blank immediately
info:
If these nodes are enabled, then a zero from teh radar will scrub the speed from the video immediately.

If one is disabled, then the camera will not be updated
